title: NICOLA STURGEON SAYS CUSTOMS UNION OFFERS BEST FUTURE FOR SCOTTISH TRADING RELATIONSHIPS
text:
NICOLA STURGEON SAYS CUSTOMS UNION OFFERS BEST FUTURE FOR SCOTTISH TRADING RELATIONSHIPS 8:55pm BST - 00:43
Nicola Sturgeon speaking at the Reuters Newsmaker event on 14th May 2018 says that she hopes the UK continues to be in a customs union with the European Union. She says if the government can deliver no hard border for Ireland then they should be able to do the same for Scotland.
